divs: Sighting Detailsoutside smoking, looked due east and see same object as reported about three weeks ago,i noticed the flashing lights as before,it is just sitting there pulsating different color lights,i reported this same object 3-4 weeks ago same location,just walked back outside 9:44pm object still there,and no there are no camp mcall actions that i know of,no helicopter in sight or sound of any flying machine,beleive the airport if you want but i know what i see for the second time.

Summary: flashing red,blue orange,lights white glow dominant
